ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Re: Node input bias in HyperNEAT
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, ... Understood. Yes, I read that as a separate option to the bias=f(x,y,0,0) option not as part of it. Colin.

Hi,

On 18 April 2010 19:25, Ken <kstanley@...> wrote:
>
> In particular, what seems to have been unclear is that the bias would be determined from a *separate*
> output of the CPPN.

Understood. Yes, I read that as a separate option to the
bias=f(x,y,0,0) option not as part of it.

Colin.
